ClassDesc: A class implements the Cloneable interface to indicate to the @B_java#lang#Object#clone_E@ method that it is legal for that method to make a field-for-field copy of instances of that class. Invoking Object's clone method on an instance that does not implement the Cloneable interface results in the exception CloneNotSupportedException being thrown. By convention, classes that implement this interface should override @B_java#lang#Object#clone_E@ for details on overriding this method. Note that this interface does
